cab.content: .V \\S E G RET.BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - 27th JULY, 1918.1.WESTERN FRONT.M French Front. There is no change in the generalsituation.Between REIMS and the MARNE British Troops have made progress in the BOIS DE COURTON and have captured BSPILLY, LESHAIES and PARADIS,The French have made further progress on the Northern hank of the MARNE and have reached the Eastern outskirts Of CHATILLOil SUE MARNE.East of REIMS the French carried out a local operation South of MONT-SANS-NOM advancing their line to a depth of about 1 kilometre on a 3 kilometre front and capturing over 200 prisoners.A German ammunition dump containing 1,000,000 rounds was abandoned in the BOIS DE BARBILLON, North East of CHATEAU THIERRY when the Germans retired from this locality, (b) British Front. The situation is unchanged.2* ITALIAN AND MACEDONIAN FRONTS, There is nothing to report.General Staff,iifar Office, S.f.1, 27th July, 1918.Issued at 6 0'cloc
